name: FRigUnit_HierarchyAddControlRotator
doc:
Adds a new control to the hierarchy
Note: This node only runs as part of the construction event.

InitialValue: * The initial value of the new control
OffsetTransform: * The offset transform of the new control
OffsetSpace: * The space the offset is in
Parent: * The parent of the new element to add
Name: FName
* The name of the new element to add
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
